name: 陳柏端
objective:
介紹各種產能反應的原子分子層級理論，包括燃燒、氫生成反應、氧還原反應、二氧化碳還原反應，和電化學電池、燃料電池，新能源材料等物理化學反應程序，以及低碳應用。
This course introduces reactions of energy production in the insight of atomic and molecular scale, including combustion, hydrogen evolution reaction, oxygen reduction reaction, carbon dioxide reduction reaction, and physiochemical mechanisms of electrochemical cells, fuel cells, new energy materials, and low-carbon applications.
schedule:
1		Preparation
2		Old quantum theory
3		Schroedinger equation
4		Particle in a box
5		Hydrogen atom
6		Molecular spectroscopy
7		Software operation
8		Applications
9		Midterm
10		Visiting synchrotron center
11		Solar cell
12		Organic solar cell
13		Perovskite
14		CO2 reduction reaction (CO2RR)
15		Fuel cell - hydrogen evolution reaction (HER)
16		Fuel cell - oxygen reduction reaction (ORR)
17		Holiday
18		Final exam (group report)
